pullrequest.title: Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate (DEFAULT)

content.raw: like GlWidget test 1 and 2? It's a viable workaround, but I think we should eventually get to the bottom of [the issue](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1261/unit_mainwindow_test-fails-when-all-tests). Ian has a lot of good ideas about what could be wrong (and these might be indicative of bugs in the gui library).
